name: Fighting Gangsters FBI
description:
Fighting Gangsters FBI!!!
Enter the cruel world of criminals & Fighting Gangsters FBI just to defeat all your rivals - dead or alive. ombat fighting action pack with different 3d character with different fighting styles like karate, mortal combat, boxing, martial arts and many more.
Exciting car thief simulator.
Rich 3D graphics and special effects.
New map and quests!
Best guns and ammunition. Try out all the weapon arsenal!
